input.sentences: the little baby enjoyed the chocolate frosting .
the boy was putting sprinkles on the cupcakes .
he poured a number on one particular cupcake .
for his birthday he got hotwheels cars .
output.sentences: When sampling frosting for our dessert we enjoyed chocolate the most.
We decided to make extra treats so we spent time putting sprinkles on cupcakes.
I was super excited to be making treats for my birthday.
My mom let me have a new job when I poured the batter for my cupcake.
When it came time to open gifts I received hotwheels and several new cars, it was a great birthday.
